name: NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions
desc: These constants specify the enumerateDraggingItems(options:for:classes:searchOptions:using:) options for the options parameter.

items.name: static var clearNonenumeratedImages: NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions
items.desc: When the following option is set, the imageComponentsProvider is automatically set to nil for all dragging items that do not meet the classes and search options criteria. Effectively, this hides the drag image for non-valid items for this destination.
